title._content: [Portrait of Joe Marsala, Adele Girard, and Toots Thielemans, 52nd Street, New York, N.Y., ca. 1948] (LOC)

description._content: Gottlieb, William P., 1917-, photographer. [Portrait of Joe Marsala, Adele Girard, and Toots Thielemans, 52nd Street, New York, N.Y., ca. 1948] 1 transparency : film, color. ; 3 1/4 x 4 1/4 in. Notes: Gottlieb Collection Assignment No. 507 Purchase William P. Gottlieb Forms part of: William P. Gottlieb Collection (Library of Congress). Subjects: Marsala, Joe, 1907-1978 Girard, Adele Thielemans, Toots Jazz musicians--1940-1950. Women jazz musicians--1940-1950. Harpists--1940-1950. Clarinetists--1940-1950. Fifty-second Street (New York, N.Y.)--1940-1950. Format: Portrait photographs--1940-1950. Group portraits--1940-1950. Film transparencies--1940-1950.
